DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine retention rate two month period vision correction emmetropic , presbyope fit multifocal contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptance & Tolerance Study Multifocal Contact Lenses Functional Emmetropes
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand sign Statement Informed Consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must 40 70 year age . 4 . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 1.00 +2.00 eye . 5 . The subject 's refractive cylinder must less equal 0.75 D eye . 6 . The subject 's ADD power must range +0.75 D +2.50 . 7 . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/25 good eye . 1 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Any ocular systemic allergy contraindicate contact lens wear . 3 . Any ocular systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , contraindicate contact lens wear . 4 . Any ocular abnormality may interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Use ocular medication , exception rewetting drop . 6 . Any previous intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc. ) . 7 . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g . edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) may contraindicate contact lens wear . 8 . History herpetic keratitis . 9 . Any ocular infection inflammation . 10 . Any corneal distortion irregular cornea . 11 . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . 12 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) . 13 . History diabetes . 14 . Current previous history prescribe correction distance vision . 15 . Current previous history contact lens wear . 16 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 30 day prior study enrollment .
